Correlation matrix dictionary processing¶

This modules collect all those functions that are capable to manipulate a correlation matrix dictionary.

@author: Christoph Sens-Schönefelder

@copyright: The MIIC Development Team (eraldo.pomponi@uni-leipzig.de)

@license: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 3 (http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/lesser.html)

Created on Nov 25, 2012

Correlation matrix dictionary processing¶

corr_mat_smooth Smoothing of a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_filter Filter a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_trim Trim the correlation matrix to a given period.
corr_mat_merge Merge correlation matrices.
corr_mat_resample Function to create correlation matrices with constant sampling
corr_mat_resample_time Resample the lapse time axis of a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_reverse Reverse the data in a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_time_select Select time period from a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_correct_decay Correct for the amplitude decay in a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_envelope Calculate the envelope of a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_normalize Correct amplitude variations with time in acorrelation matrix.
corr_mat_mirrow Average the causal and acausal parts of a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_taper_center Taper the central part of a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_import_US_stream Convert a stream with multiple traces from an active measurement in a correlation matrix structure.
corr_mat_extract_trace Extract a representative trace from a correlation matrix.
corr_mat_stretch Time stretch estimate through stretch and comparison.
corr_mat_correct_stretch Correct stretching of correlation matrix
corr_mat_add_lat_lon_ele Add coordinates to correlation matrix.
corr_mat_create_from_traces Create correlation matrix files from a set or correlation trace files
corr_mat_from_corr_stream Create a correlation matrix from an obspy stream.
